spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 396,900 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 189,401.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 691,560, and grants you up to 11,437 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 853,607 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)
